movie.title: Redeemer
movie.description_intro: A former hit-man for a drug cartel becomes a vigilante to pay for his sins and find redemption.
movie.description_full: A former hit-man for a drug cartel becomes a vigilante to pay for his sins and find redemption.

movies.title: Secret Weapon
movies.summary: The film tells about the famous Soviet rocket launcher nicknamed "Katyusha", which was kept in great secrecy during World War 2. One of these unique killing machines has drowned during an unexpected retreat of the Russian troops. A special unit is sent to rescue the secret weapon that the Germans can never find - no matter what it takes .

movies.title: Frank Miller's Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
movies.title_english: Frank Miller's Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
movies.title_long: Frank Miller's Sin City: A Dame to Kill For (2014)
movies.summary: Marv is unconscious on a highway surrounded by corpses. When he awakes, he has amnesia and tries to recall his last steps from the Kadie's saloon on the Saturday night. He recalls that he found four playboys burning a homeless man alive and defended the poor man. Marv hunts them down and kills the group. The cocky gambler Johnny hits jackpot in slot machines in the Kadie's saloon and invites the waitress Marcie to go with him to play poker game against the powerful Senator Roark. He wins the game and suffers the consequence of his arrogance. The private detective Dwight McCarthy is contacted by his former lover Ava Lord that asks to meet him at the Kadie's saloon. Ava asks him for forgiveness for leaving him to marry the wealthy Damian Lord. However her strong chauffeur Manute takes her home. Dwight snoops around Ava's house but is found and beaten by Manute and the bodyguards. When he returns home, Ava is waiting for him naked in the bed and seduces him again. Then she tells that ...

movies.title: The Snow Queen 2
movies.summary: Snow queen casts a curse on her mirror making people see the worst in themselves.
movies.description_full: Snow queen casts a curse on her mirror making people see the worst in themselves.
movies.synopsis: Snow queen casts a curse on her mirror making people see the worst in themselves.

movies.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge on the Run
movies.title_english: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge on the Run
movies.title_long: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge on the Run (2020)
movies.summary: Set before the events of the television series, SpongeBob goes on a trip to Kamp Koral and meets some new friends. However, when his pet snail Gary gets kidnapped by Poseidon and taken to the Lost City of Atlantic City, he and his new best friend Patrick must go on a rescue mission to save him from the dastardly plan of Poseidon before it is too late. The movie will also reveal the first time our beloved characters (as kids) met at Camp...a magical moment that brings meaning to the power of true friendship.

The movie will also reveal the first time our beloved characters (as kids) met at Camp...a magical moment that brings meaning to the power of true friendship.
